verses.text_plain: Then they told David, saying, Behold, the Philistines fight against Keilah, and they rob the threshingfloors.
verses.verse_html: 1Then they told David, saying, Behold, the Philistines fight against Keilah, and they rob the threshingfloors.

verses.text_plain: Therefore David enquired of the Lord, saying, Shall I go and smite these Philistines? And the Lord said unto David, Go, and smite the Philistines, and save Keilah.
verses.verse_html: 2Therefore David enquired of the Lord, saying, Shall I go and smite these Philistines? And the Lord said unto David, Go, and smite the Philistines, and save Keilah.

verses.text_plain: And David’s men said unto him, Behold, we be afraid here in Judah: how much more then if we come to Keilah against the armies of the Philistines?
verses.verse_html: 3And David’s men said unto him, Behold, we be afraid here in Judah: how much more then if we come to Keilah against the armies of the Philistines?

tokens.text: unto him, Behold, we be afraid
how much more then if we come

verses.text_plain: Then David enquired of the Lord yet again. And the Lord answered him and said, Arise, go down to Keilah; for I will deliver the Philistines into thine hand.
verses.verse_html: 4Then David enquired of the Lord yet again. And the Lord answered him and said, Arise, go down to Keilah; for I will deliver the Philistines into thine hand.

verses.text_plain: So David and his men went to Keilah, and fought with the Philistines, and brought away their cattle, and smote them with a great slaughter. So David saved the inhabitants of Keilah.
verses.verse_html: 5So David and his men went to Keilah, and fought with the Philistines, and brought away their cattle, and smote them with a great slaughter. So David saved the inhabitants of Keilah.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, when Abiathar the son of Ahimelech fled to David to Keilah, that he came down with an ephod in his hand.
verses.verse_html: 6And it came to pass, when Abiathar the son of Ahimelech fled to David to Keilah, that he came down with an ephod in his hand.

tokens.text: And it came to pass, when Abiathar

verses.text_plain: And it was told Saul that David was come to Keilah. And Saul said, God hath delivered him into mine hand; for he is shut in, by entering into a town that hath gates and bars.
verses.verse_html: 7And it was told Saul that David was come to Keilah. And Saul said, God hath delivered him into mine hand; for he is shut in, by entering into a town that hath gates and bars.

verses.text_plain: And Saul called all the people together to war, to go down to Keilah, to besiege David and his men.
verses.verse_html: 8And Saul called all the people together to war, to go down to Keilah, to besiege David and his men.

verses.text_plain: And David knew that Saul secretly practised mischief against him; and he said to Abiathar the priest, Bring hither the ephod.
verses.verse_html: 9And David knew that Saul secretly practised mischief against him; and he said to Abiathar the priest, Bring hither the ephod.

verses.text_plain: Then said David, O Lord God of Israel, thy servant hath certainly heard that Saul seeketh to come to Keilah, to destroy the city for my sake.
verses.verse_html: 10Then said David, O Lord God of Israel, thy servant hath certainly heard that Saul seeketh to come to Keilah, to destroy the city for my sake.

verses.text_plain: Will the men of Keilah deliver me up into his hand? will Saul come down, as thy servant hath heard? O Lord God of Israel, I beseech thee, tell thy servant. And the Lord said, He will come down.
verses.verse_html: 11Will the men of Keilah deliver me up into his hand? will Saul come down, as thy servant hath heard? O Lord God of Israel, I beseech thee, tell thy servant. And the Lord said, He will come down.

verses.text_plain: Then said David, Will the men of Keilah deliver me and my men into the hand of Saul? And the Lord said, They will deliver thee up.
verses.verse_html:
12Then said David, Will the men of Keilah deliver me and my men into the hand of Saul? And the Lord said, They will deliver thee up. ▼
▼ deliver: Heb. shut up

footnotes.body_html: ▼ deliver: Heb. shut up

verses.text_plain: Then David and his men, which were about six hundred, arose and departed out of Keilah, and went whithersoever they could go. And it was told Saul that David was escaped from Keilah; and he forbare to go forth.
verses.verse_html: 13Then David and his men, which were about six hundred, arose and departed out of Keilah, and went whithersoever they could go. And it was told Saul that David was escaped from Keilah; and he forbare to go forth.

verses.text_plain: And David abode in the wilderness in strong holds, and remained in a mountain in the wilderness of Ziph. And Saul sought him every day, but God delivered him not into his hand.
verses.verse_html: 14And David abode in the wilderness in strong holds, and remained in a mountain in the wilderness of Ziph. And Saul sought him every day, but God delivered him not into his hand.

verses.text_plain: And David saw that Saul was come out to seek his life: and David was in the wilderness of Ziph in a wood.
verses.verse_html: 15And David saw that Saul was come out to seek his life: and David was in the wilderness of Ziph in a wood.

verses.text_plain: And Jonathan Saul’s son arose, and went to David into the wood, and strengthened his hand in God.
verses.verse_html: 16And Jonathan Saul’s son arose, and went to David into the wood, and strengthened his hand in God.

verses.text_plain: And he said unto him, Fear not: for the hand of Saul my father shall not find thee; and thou shalt be king over Israel, and I shall be next unto thee; and that also Saul my father knoweth.
verses.verse_html: 17And he said unto him, Fear not: for the hand of Saul my father shall not find thee; and thou shalt be king over Israel, and I shall be next unto thee; and that also Saul my father knoweth.

tokens.text: thee; and thou shalt be king
unto thee; and that also Saul

verses.text_plain: And they two made a covenant before the Lord: and David abode in the wood, and Jonathan went to his house.
verses.verse_html: 18And they two made a covenant before the Lord: and David abode in the wood, and Jonathan went to his house.

verses.text_plain: Then came up the Ziphites to Saul to Gibeah, saying, Doth not David hide himself with us in strong holds in the wood, in the hill of Hachilah, which is on the south of Jeshimon?
verses.verse_html:
19Then came up the Ziphites to Saul to Gibeah, saying, Doth not David hide himself with us in strong holds in the wood, in the hill of Hachilah, which is on the south of Jeshimon? ▼
▼ on…: Heb. on the right hand
 , ▼
▼ Jeshimon: or, the wilderness

tokens.text: himself with us in strong holds

footnotes.body_text: ▼ on…: Heb. on the right hand
footnotes.body_html: ▼ on…: Heb. on the right hand
▼ Jeshimon: or, the wilderness

verses.text_plain: Now therefore, O king, come down according to all the desire of thy soul to come down; and our part shall be to deliver him into the king’s hand.
verses.verse_html: 20Now therefore, O king, come down according to all the desire of thy soul to come down; and our part shall be to deliver him into the king’s hand.

verses.text_plain: And Saul said, Blessed be ye of the Lord; for ye have compassion on me.
verses.verse_html: 21And Saul said, Blessed be ye of the Lord; for ye have compassion on me.

verses.text_plain: Go, I pray you, prepare yet, and know and see his place where his haunt is, and who hath seen him there: for it is told me that he dealeth very subtilly.
verses.verse_html:
22Go, I pray you, prepare yet, and know and see his place where his haunt is, and who hath seen him there: for it is told me that he dealeth very subtilly. ▼
▼ haunt…: Heb. foot shall be

tokens.text: him there: for it is told

footnotes.body_html: ▼ haunt…: Heb. foot shall be

verses.text_plain: See therefore, and take knowledge of all the lurking places where he hideth himself, and come ye again to me with the certainty, and I will go with you: and it shall come to pass, if he be in the land, that I will search him out throughout all the thousands of Judah.
verses.verse_html: 23See therefore, and take knowledge of all the lurking places where he hideth himself, and come ye again to me with the certainty, and I will go with you: and it shall come to pass, if he be in the land, that I will search him out throughout all the thousands of Judah.

tokens.text: with you: and it shall come to pass, if he be
him out throughout all the thousands

verses.text_plain: And they arose, and went to Ziph before Saul: but David and his men were in the wilderness of Maon, in the plain on the south of Jeshimon.
verses.verse_html: 24And they arose, and went to Ziph before Saul: but David and his men were in the wilderness of Maon, in the plain on the south of Jeshimon.

verses.text_plain: Saul also and his men went to seek him. And they told David: wherefore he came down into a rock, and abode in the wilderness of Maon. And when Saul heard that, he pursued after David in the wilderness of Maon.
verses.verse_html:
25Saul also and his men went to seek him. And they told David: wherefore he came down into a rock, and abode in the wilderness of Maon. And when Saul heard that, he pursued after David in the wilderness of Maon. ▼
▼ into…: or, from the rock

footnotes.body_html: ▼ into…: or, from the rock

verses.text_plain: And Saul went on this side of the mountain, and David and his men on that side of the mountain: and David made haste to get away for fear of Saul; for Saul and his men compassed David and his men round about to take them.
verses.verse_html: 26And Saul went on this side of the mountain, and David and his men on that side of the mountain: and David made haste to get away for fear of Saul; for Saul and his men compassed David and his men round about to take them.

verses.text_plain: But there came a messenger unto Saul, saying, Haste thee, and come; for the Philistines have invaded the land.
verses.verse_html:
27But there came a messenger unto Saul, saying, Haste thee, and come; for the Philistines have invaded the land. ▼
▼ invaded…: Heb. spread themselves upon, etc

footnotes.body_text: ▼ invaded…: Heb. spread themselves upon, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ invaded…: Heb. spread themselves upon, etc

verses.text_plain: Wherefore Saul returned from pursuing after David, and went against the Philistines: therefore they called that place Sela–hammahlekoth.
verses.verse_html:
28Wherefore Saul returned from pursuing after David, and went against the Philistines: therefore they called that place Sela–hammahlekoth. ▼
▼ Sela–hammahlekoth: that is, The rock of divisions

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Sela–hammahlekoth: that is, The rock of divisions
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Sela–hammahlekoth: that is, The rock of divisions

verses.text_plain: And David went up from thence, and dwelt in strong holds at En–gedi.
verses.verse_html: 29And David went up from thence, and dwelt in strong holds at En–gedi.
